item.title: Ubuntu Server 12.04 + Drupal 7 + nginx + MySQL
item.description: Default Drupal package in Ubuntu installs Apache, but I prefer nginx as a webserver. In this note Iâ€™ll describe steps necessary to get Drupal 7 work. All variables in square brackets must be replaced by your names or passwords. Site will be available at url [sitename]. # Installing packages Install all necessary packages: sudo apt-get install -y nginx php5-fpm php-apc php5-mysql mysql-client-core-5.5 mysql-server php5-gd During the installation MySQL will ask you for root password.
